name: Ruby Crystal Beaded Copper Wire Tree Sculpture
description:
This gorgeous tree is made of twisted copper wire adorned with deep ruby crystal beads. The tree is mounted on a piece of black granite. 
It stands 6" tall by 5" wide.

name: White Crystal Beaded Wire Tree Sculpture
description:
This dazzling tree is made up of a combination of clear and white beads intertwined throughout the long sweeping branches of this steel wire sculpture. It is attached to a beautiful piece of granite. 

This tree stands approx. 9" tall and 8" wide.

name: Black Crystal Copper Wire Tree Sculpture
description:
This copper wire tree sculpture is adorned with black crystal beads and attached to a soapstone base. It stands approx. 10" tall by 8" wide. 
Fun and whimsical, it makes a great centerpiece or decoration.

name: Aqua Green Wire Tree Sculpture
description:
Stunning wire tree sculpture made with with steel wire that has been twisted and shaped to form a trunk, roots and branches. Aqua Green crystal beads are twisted into each branch. The tree is mounted on a slab of black slate stone. 

Tree stands approx. 8" tall and 7" wide.
